how-to-download-app.question: How to download the App?
how-to-download-app.answer: Download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store.

how-do-i-charge-my-wallet.question: How do I charge my wallet?
how-do-i-charge-my-wallet.answer: You can top up your wallet using prepaid cards. Simply buy a card, enter the code in the app, and the amount will be added to your wallet.

where-can-i-buy-recharge-card.question: Where can I buy a recharge card?
where-can-i-buy-recharge-card.answer: Recharge cards are available at most convenience stores and online.

what-if-recharge-card-doesnt-work.question: What if my recharge card doesn't work?
what-if-recharge-card-doesnt-work.answer: If your recharge card doesn't work, please contact customer support with your card details.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Fady. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately.

use-of-service.content: You must use Fady in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and for all activities that occur under your account.

user-responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
user-responsibilities.content: You agree not to misuse our services by interfering with their normal operation or attempting to access them using a method other than through the interface provided by us.

limitation-of-liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability

governing-law.title: 6. Governing Law
governing-law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Fady is headquartered.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
